channel.description: Recent content in Steely Dan on Music

item.title: Steely Dan - Aja
item.description:
Up on the hill
people never stare
They just
don’t care-

Chinese music
under banyan trees
Here at the dude ranch
above the sea
Aja when all my dime
dancing is through
I run to
you-

Up on the hill
They’ve got time
to burn
there’s no return-

Double helix
in the sky tonight
Throw out the hardware
let’s do it right-
Aja when all my dime
dancing is through
I run to
you-

Up on the hill
they think I’m okay
Or so
they say-

Chinese music
always sets me free
Angular banjoes
sound good to me
Aja when all my dime
dancing is through
I run to
you-
